info.name: How-To Geek Clean
info.description:
A small script to widen and cleanup the How-To Geek website.
-Widens the column
-Eliminates the sidebars
-Eliminates the footer
info.additionalInfo: I utilized some of the CSS code from  acebrain01 (https://userstyles.org/styles/23357/how-to-geek-wide) and made some tweaks.
